headline: Civil Engineering Hike Once Again
summary: The Civil Engineering Student Chapter has once again went to grassland this year. It was a tiring, but fun, exciting experience.
author: Kent Erbert Villar

headline: Guest Lecture: Future of Urban Design
summary: Renowned architect Maria Santos shared insights on sustainable urban planning.
author: Jane Smith

headline: New Chapter Leadership Elected
summary: The annual elections concluded with Anna Cruz being elected as the new chapter president.
author: Emily Davis

headline: Volunteering at Community Building Project
summary: Students volunteered in building a community center in Barangay Mabini.
author: Michael Johnson

headline: Civil Engineering Week Kicks Off
summary: The week-long celebration of Civil Engineering Week starts with workshops and seminars.
author: Chris Brown

headline: Scholarship Opportunities for CE Students
summary: New scholarships are now available for aspiring civil engineers. Application deadlines approaching soon.
author: Anna Cruz

headline: Field Trip to the New Bridge Construction Site
summary: Students had the opportunity to visit the construction site of the new highway bridge.
author: John Doe

headline: Engineering Competition Winners Announced
summary: The Civil Engineering student team won the first prize at the regional engineering competition.
author: Jane Smith

headline: Fundraising Event for Community Projects
summary: A successful fundraising event was held to support ongoing community infrastructure projects.
author: Emily Davis

headline: Technical Workshop: Bridge Design Fundamentals
summary: A technical workshop was conducted to explore the fundamentals of bridge design.
author: Michael Johnson
